text:
☎️We are calling for a #PeoplesVaccine!☎️

People in all countries deserve access to a #COVID19 #vaccine, not just those who live in wealthy countries! 

@pfizer, @moderna_tx & @AstraZeneca must join the @WHO #COVID19 technology access pool.

Join us: https://t.co/AA945BIj2z https://t.co/Z8ggBz3UyD
